name: Evokers
description:
Evokers is an action RPG, in development by the Supreme Assembly, with decks being your primary way of fighting your way through the enemies. Explore, craft and learn about a world where magic is the driving force.... or so it seems...

Try the game and leave your feedback, it's very very very very very very much needed.
Learn spells and combine them with parchments and inks to create Evocations and design decks that serve as your weapons.  Potions are a secondary element of the game as will be crafting and professions later on. A talent system is to be implemented as well.

Current Alpha estimated time play time: ~ 2 hours.
